title: Complete Pancreatic Agenesis Presenting With Neonatal Diabetes and Exocrine Insufficiency: A Case Report.
abstract: Pancreatic agenesis is one of the most challenging genetic conditions to manage. This case report describes a male infant with complete pancreatic agenesis due to a homozygousÂ
